title.narrative: Public Financial Management Reform Procurement of Services

description.narrative: This activity (Public Financial Management Reform Procurement of Services) is a component of Public Financial Management Reform Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £484,822. This component benefits Ghana, and works in the following sector(s): Public finance management (PFM), Anti-corruption organisations and institutions. , with the following implementing partners: Coffey International Development, Crown Agents Limited, HM Revenue and Customs, KPMG East Africa. The start date is 18-10-2010 and the end date is 31-08-2015.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
